mapper.select: SELECT C.CARDSEQ, C.CARDTITLE, C.CARDCONTENT, C.USERSEQ, C.CARDREADCOUNT, C.CARDDATE, C.CARDFILENAME, C.CARDDEL, U.NICKNAME, CF.LIKECOUNT, P.PRODUCTSEQ, P.PRODUCTNAME, P.PRODUCTFILENAME, CC.LOCATIONX, CC.LOCATIONY, CT.TAGCOLOR, CT.TAGHOMETYPE, CT.TAGSTYLE FROM CARD_COLLECTIONS C, USERS U, PRODUCTIONS P, CARD_COORDINATES CC, (SELECT CARDSEQ, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) LIKECOUNT FROM CARD_FAVORITE GROUP BY CARDSEQ) CF, CARD_TAG CT WHERE C.USERSEQ=U.USERSEQ AND C.CARDSEQ=CC.CARDSEQ(+) AND C.CARDSEQ=CF.CARDSEQ(+) AND CT.CARDSEQ=C.CARDSEQ AND CC.PRODUCTSEQ=P.PRODUCTSEQ(+) ORDER BY C.CARDDATE DESC
